page.title: 02HOW PUPILS TRAVEL TO SCHOOL
page.content: I ASKED MY FORM 1:4 A MIXED CLASS OF 30 PUPILS,HOW THEY TRAVEL TO SCHOOL AND BACK EVERY DAY AND ALSO HOW FAR THEY LIVE FROM SCHOOL. MY SURVEY SHOWED THAT 9 WALK,14 RIDE BICYCLES, 3 GO BY CAR, 1 GOES BY BUS. THIS SHOWS THAT CYCLING IS THE MOST COMMON WAY OF TRAVELLING TO SCHOOL. 7 PEOPLE TAKE 5 MINUTES TO GET TO SCHOOL AND 7 TAKE 10 MINUTES, 8 TAKE 15 MINUTES, AND 4 TAKE 30 MINUTES. THIS SHOWS THAT MOST PEOPLE TAKE 15 MINUTES OR LESS TO GET TO SCHOOL. 2 PEOPLE TRAVEL ROUGHLY 1/4 OF A MILE TO GET TO SCHOOL, 5 PEOPLE LIVE 1/2 A MILE FROM SCHOOL, 6 LIVE 1 MILE FROM SCHOOL AND 12 LIVE LESS THAN 1/4 OF A MILE FROM SCHOOL. THIS SHOWS MOST PEOPLE LIVE CLOSE TO SCHOOL. 12 PEOPLE ARE ON TIME WHEN THEY GET TO SCHOOL,10 ARE EARLY AND 5 ARE LATE. THIS SHOWS MOST PUPILS ARE PUNCTUAL.
